author: Lespleigney, Thibault, 1496-1550
title: Dispe[n]sariu[m] paruum Nicolai Pr¾positi, de usu pharmaceutices, : In consarcinandis medicame[n]tis, Isagoge. Ad vulgarem medendi regulam, nequaquam dissimulatis empiricoru[m] succidaneis at[que] ... pr¾parationibus & administrationibus, ... / Theobaldo
